p: Included in this analysis are HIV-infected patients with an ESOPE file opened between August 1, 1998 and December 31, 2015, who were na√Øve of ART at entry and who were at least 15 years of age. The analyses were run using all visits from August 1, 1998 until June 30, 2016. Patients registered as outpatients, because they were monitored at another center, were excluded from the analysis.
